template.name: SYMGRP:Point group information
template.comment:
SYMGRP:Point group information ------------------------------
Point group: C2v
* The point group was generated by:
Reflection in the xz-plane Reflection in the xy-plane
* Group multiplication table
| E C2x Oxy Oxz -----+-------------------- E | E C2x | C2x E Oxy | Oxy Oxz E Oxz | Oxz Oxy C2x E
* Character table
| E C2x Oxy Oxz -----+-------------------- A1 | 1 1 1 1 B1 | 1 -1 1 -1 B2 | 1 -1 -1 1 A2 | 1 1 -1 -1
* Direct product table
| A1 B1 B2 A2 -----+-------------------- A1 | A1 B1 | B1 A1 B2 | B2 A2 A1 A2 | A2 B2 B1 A1
